Uses of Package
com.craftar

Classes in com.craftar used by com.craftar
CraftARActivity
          Activities using the CraftARSDK must extend CraftARActivity instead of Activity.
CraftARCamera
          Used to manage functions related to the camera.
CraftARCameraView
           
CraftARCloudRecognition
          Module that interacts with the CRS service.
CraftARCloudRecognitionError
          Describes an error that happened while performing calls to the cloud
CraftARImage
          Class that wraps a jpeg image using the optimal resolution and compression.
CraftARImageHandler
          Interface that receives the responses of the calls to CraftARCamera.takePicture()
CraftARItem
          Contains an item from a cloud search.
CraftARItemFactory
          Parses the CraftARItem from a JSON object and detects if is an AR or IR item (Augmented Reality or Image Recognition only).
CraftARResponseHandler
          Interface to receive the responses from the CraftARCloudRecognition.
CraftARSDKException
          Manages internal exceptions occurred within the CraftAR SDK
CRSConnect
          CRSConnect allows you to send requests to the CraftAR Recognition Server.
CRSConnectHandler
          Implemented by the CraftARCloudRecognition class to receive the network responses from the CRSConnect.
